rules.description: ctrl+h to backspace
efn:e+[hjkl] to page up/down,home,end
command+spacebar to play_or_pause
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+[arrow] to Volume Up/Down,Brightness Up/Down
right_ctrl press alone to escape
SpaceFN: Space+[1-=] to F[1-12]
窗口切换option + 数字/n/p
同一空间激活窗口 option + hjkl
同一空间交换窗口位置shift option + hjkl
窗口旋转/调转 option + r/y
切换焦点到下一显示器 option + `
移动窗口至下一个显示器 option + tab
把窗口发送到上/下个桌面 并切换过去shift option + p/n

to.shell_command: (/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --space next && /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --focus next) || (/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --space first && /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --focus first)
(/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --space prev && /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --focus prev) || (/usr/local/bin/yabai -m window --space last && /usr/local/bin/yabai -m space --focus last)

rules.description: 创建桌面，（移动当前窗口过去+ shift ），并跟随焦点 option + c
窗口平衡/窗口最大化 shift option + d/s
调整窗口大小 option + 方向键
浮动窗口左右贴边 shift option + 方向键
重启yabai shift option + r

to.shell_command: /usr/bin/env osascript <<< "display notification \"正在重启 Yabai\" with title \"Yabai\""; launchctl kickstart -k "gui/${UID}/homebrew.mxcl.yabai"

rules.description: 在父空间放大缩小 shift option + a
切换窗口分割方式 shift option + m
当桌面为空时关闭桌面option + w
当桌面为不空时也关闭桌面 shift option + w
当前窗口切换为浮动模式 option + f
当前窗口切换stack模式 option + u
当前窗口切换stack模式 shift option + u
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0)
SpaceFN: Space+[1-=] to F[1-12]
SpaceFN: Space+[arrow] to Page Up/Down,Home,End
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
ctrl+h to backspace
efn:e+[hjkl] to page up/down,home,end
